Yarn Cloud Technologies formally Manzel Express

Is an all-in-one solution for all your property management and business needs

An innovative solution, born originally in the state of Delaware in the US back in 2014

we offer a suite of services that are designed to meet the unique needs of your organization. With our deep understanding of finance, IT, and software development, we are able to offer a highly extensible solution that is tailored to your specific requirements.

Leader in GCC

Yarn has managed to penetrate the KSA & the rest of the GCC market in less than one year, challenging the current Real Estate recession in 2022; simply because the system has been proven to reduce operational cost significantly, and promote new revenue streams.

Our Team

We are a business experts who noticed the gaps in the traditional real estate and property management business. We saw a need for better communication, better tenant relationships, and better service. The only way to transform this industry was through technology. And so, we set out to create the most innovative and user-friendly platform possible.

Our solutions are made for different business models and markets

Residential

Digitalize Your Residential Developments Management and change your residences experience .

Commercial

Rent out and manage your spaces, offices, or amenities all in one platform.

Retail

The retail suite helps you tooptimize all aspects of your business, including evaluating current and future occupancy and improving customer experience by gaining better analytical insight

Our Team

We're a group of Residential Communities experts and software engineers passionate about making your job easier! With more than 16 years of experience
